extra.message: Request data detected in os.system. This could be vulnerable to a command injection and should be avoided. If this must be done, use the 'subprocess' module instead and pass the arguments as a list. See https://owasp.org/www-community/attacks/Command_Injection for more information.

cwe: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
